SceneDividerUI.Title: Scene Scroller Maker: Scene Divider
SceneDividerUI.Explanation1: This application will guide you through dividing a complete scene to make several sub-scenes from it.  The sub-scenes can then be used with the Scene Scroller module.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation2: The algorithm uses the Fog of War to define the divisions, one piece at a time.  Your scene must be completely walled and Fog of War turned on.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation3: The background image will be divided and saved in .webp format at a location you must choose.  Do not choose an existing module folder, as those will be overwritten when modules are updated.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation4: This application will create a new scene compendium.  You must provide a name for this compendium.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation5: Create new divisions by clicking on the 'PLUS' button at the bottom right.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation6: Enter a sub-scene name then click on 'Continue' to begin defining the sub-scene area.
SceneDividerUI.ErrorNoSubSceneName: Enter a sub-scene name before continuing.
SceneDividerUI.ErrorDivNotFinish: Finish the in-work Division before creating new ones.
SceneDividerUI.ErrorNoCompName: Enter a name for the new compendium before continuing.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation7: Click and drag cursor to reveal Fog of War.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation8: The explored area in the Fog of War will define the bounding box for the new sub-scene.
SceneDividerUI.Explanation9: NOTE:  You must drag the cursor to spawn the continue button.  A click is not sufficient.
SceneDividerUI.ConfirmUsePack2: for scenes already exists.  Do you wish to add the sub-scenes to this pack?
SceneDividerUI.SceneScrollerNoFlags: Scene Scroller module not active.  Extra data for that module has not been embedded in the compendium scene flags.

ResizeImageUI.Title: Resize Image Controls and Submit
ResizeImageUI.Instructions1: If the image needs to be resized larger than the scene size, then manually resize the scene.  The final image size MUST be fully contained in the scene.

CropImageUI.Title: Crop Image Instructions and Submit
CropImageUI.Instructions1: Use the drawing tool to cover the area to keep with shapes.  Can use rectangles, circles or oddly shaped polygons.  The only requirement is the drawing shapes overlap at least one other shape.

ConvertImgFile.name: Convert-Image-File
ConvertImgFile.title: Select an image file to convert to .webp

ConvertImgFolder.name: Convert-Images-In-Folder
ConvertImgFolder.title: Convert all images in folder to .webp

T2P_Errors.Clipper_Union: Union of vision polygons failed in #generateDrawingPolygon().
T2P_Errors.title: Review generated area.
T2P_Errors.content:
Click YES to continue if the shape of the polygon is correct.

Otherwise, click NO to abort execution.
